actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on macroporus adsorpent polymer composed of crosslinked phenol-formaldehyde polycondesate resin in granular form having a mean particle size of 0.56 to 0.76 mm.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on macroporus adsorpent polymer composed of crosslinked phenol-formaldehyde polycondesate resin in granular form having a mean particle size of 0.56 to 0.76 mm.

titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on macroporus adsorpent polymer composed of crosslinked phenol-formaldehyde polycondesate resin in granular form having a mean particle size of 0.56 to 0.76 mm.
